reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater vest stylish and versatile, being able to dress up or down, and appreciate its good quality, soft fabric, comfort, and loose fit.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome, Soft, Green Sweater Vest
items.body: Really like this sweater vest. It is oversized and I initially ordered a large so it would be big and loose leggings but I did find this size was just too big so I purchased it in a smaller size. The army green color is a beautiful color and it is as pictured. The green color looks great with black leggings and boots. The sweater is high quality and warm. I have washed it several times and is holds it shape and washes and dries nicely with out shrinking or losing shape and getting stretched out. The yarn in this vest is soft, close knitted and durable. You can wear it with a blouse, a tunic tee or a turtle or mock neck and it looks great. The arm holes on this sweater are nice and wide and the v-neck is the right depth and not too deep. The length comes down to the low hip on me. I like these sweater vests but let the way you want it to fit determine the size you order. I am 5’3” was around 140 pounds when I ordered the large and found it too big so I exchanged for a medium. I have since lost more weight a could now go with a small and it wouldn’t be tight, but the medium is still good. Read more
items.author: sailfishes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality loose fitting vest
items.body: I had been looking for a vest and tried this one because of the price. I usually wear a size medium but got this in large for an oversized look and it’s great, fits like the photo. The material is very soft and feels smooth and high quality. Perfect for layering over a tshirt or any shirt, it isn’t bulky or heavy, it has a nice medium weight. I got a great deal and worried that meant it wasn’t a quality item, but I am pleasantly surprised and impressed with this sweater vest. Cute, quality, versatile and a great value compared to any other seller. Can’t even find a secondhand sweater vest for this price- I will be ordering more colors. (Have not washed it yet, so I can’t attest to how it lasts). Definitely recommend giving it a try. Update- I washed it and finished the drying in the dryer because I wanted to get rid of lint, and the vest didn’t come out looking brand new but it was fine- just not as perfect. I recommend skipping the dryer if you can Read more
items.author: Molly

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy
items.body: Nice quality and fits as pictured. The arm holes are a little large so be prepared for a matching or complimentary undergarment. Great color and style. Read more
items.author: Jule L.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this
items.body: This sweater is very flattering on. The size is perfect. The material is soft. It's comfortable. It is lightweight, especially for Florida. We have 80-degree weather most of the winter. When it does get cold here, it's for a day or two and long enough to wear jeans and maybe a lightweight sweater. I really like this sweater vest because it is perfect for our winter here. Sleeveless, lightweight, and looks dressy with slacks. Casual with Jeans. Read more
items.author: Cathy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute and cheap
items.body: True to color and comfy. But quality was what you pay for. Looks a little cheap. Read more
items.author: Nandini R. King

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Color is as seen. Value fantastic
items.body: So many compliments. The material is soft and luxurious. To date I have purchased this sweater in three different colors because it is so great. Fit is great and coverage. Just right, not small, not big. All three have maintained their shape after multiple washings on the gentle cycle and hung dry. I am trying to not buy a fourth or fifth in other colors but the value is one of the best. I’ve worn this in 90 degree weather outside and then low 70 degree office and my SIL keeps his house in the 60s. It was great for all temperatures. Read more
items.author: Michelle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars looks better on than in the package
items.body: Of all the clothes this sweater was the biggest surprise, when I unpacked it, it looked huge,I ordered a small , I tried it on anyway and it fit me perfectly. For the price it is a good deal. I am 5’2”. Weigh 108 lbs. Read more
items.author: Strong

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect little white v neck shirt!
items.body: Love this shirt, it is so soft! The quality is great and the cost is amazing. It’s not too thick but definitely not thin at all. The size might be true, I ordered up and shouldn’t have. The style is perfect, you can go casual with some jeans and could dress up with a blazer. Read more
items.author: Meggan Melandow

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Coral Powder, Brown, Blue, Burgundy, Dark Grey, White-a, Army Green, Light Green, Black, Coffee, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Navy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
